29  MotorModule::MotorModule(Bus& canbus, const uint8_t moduleId) :
30  m_ModuleId(moduleId),
31  m_Bus(canbus),
32  m_bIsRunning(true),
33  m_pWriteThread(nullptr),
34  m_MotorPosition(0),
35  m_DOutputs(0),
36  m_MotorIncrement(0),
37  m_CurrentTimeStamp(0),
38  m_MotorMinPosition(-32655),
39  m_MotorMaxPosition(32655),
40  m_MotorPositionOffset(0)
41  {
42  Start();
43  }

47  uint8_t MotorModule::get_DigitalInputs() const
48  {
49  uint8_t timeStamp;
50  std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point receptionTime;
51  uint8_t errorFlags;
52  uint8_t dinputs;
53  get_CurrentPosition(timeStamp,receptionTime,errorFlags,dinputs);
54  return dinputs;

96  void MotorModule::Stop()
97  {
98  m_bIsRunning = false;
99  if (m_pWriteThread != nullptr)
100  {
101  m_pWriteThread->join();
102  delete m_pWriteThread;
103  m_pWriteThread = nullptr;
104  }
105  }
106 
108  void MotorModule::Start()
109  {
110  m_bIsRunning = true;
111  m_pWriteThread = new std::thread(WriteThread, this);
112  }

117  {
118  return m_ModuleId;
119  }

123  void MotorModule::WriteThread(MotorModule * pModule)
124  {
125  pModule->WriteLoop();
126  }
127 
129  void MotorModule::WriteLoop()
130  {
131  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Write thread started.");
132  while (m_bIsRunning)
133  {
134  std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point last=std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now();
135  set_DesiredPosition(m_MotorPosition+m_MotorIncrement);
136  Command_SetJoint(m_MotorPosition, m_DOutputs);
137  std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point current=std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now();
138  int64_t ms=(std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(current - last)).count();
139  if(ms<50)
140  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(m_UpdateInterval-ms));
141  }
142  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Write thread terminating.");
143  }
144 
147  int32_t MotorModule::get_DesiredPosition() const
148  {
149  return m_MotorPosition;
150  }
151 
154  void MotorModule::set_DesiredPosition(const int32_t ticks)
155  {
156  m_MotorPosition = ticks;
157  int32_t M=std::max(m_MotorMinPosition,m_MotorMaxPosition); // values of min and max may be swapped if gear ratios are negative
158  int32_t m=std::min(m_MotorMinPosition,m_MotorMaxPosition);
159  if(m_MotorPosition<m)
160  {
161  ROS_INFO("Module %u: Clamping position %i to minium of %i ticks.",m_ModuleId,m_MotorPosition,m);
162  m_MotorPosition=m;
163  }
164  if(m_MotorPosition>M)
165  {
166  ROS_INFO("Module %u: Clamping position %i to maximum of %i ticks.",m_ModuleId,m_MotorPosition,M);
167  m_MotorPosition=M;
168  }
169  }
170 
175  double MotorModule::get_UpdateInterval() const
176  {
177  return 0.001*(double)m_UpdateInterval;
178  }
179 
180 
184  void MotorModule::Command_SetJoint(const int32_t ticks, const uint8_t doutput)
185  {
186  struct can_frame frame;
187  frame.can_id = (canid_t)(m_ModuleId << 4);
188  frame.can_dlc = 8;
189  frame.data[0] = 0x14;
190  frame.data[1] = 0x00;
191  int32_t positionWithOffset=ticks+m_MotorPositionOffset;
192  frame.data[2] = (((uint32_t)positionWithOffset) & 0xFF000000u) >> 24;
193  frame.data[3] = (((uint32_t)positionWithOffset) & 0x00FF0000u) >> 16;
194  frame.data[4] = (((uint32_t)positionWithOffset) & 0x0000FF00u) >> 8;
195  frame.data[5] = ((uint32_t)positionWithOffset) & 0x000000FFu;
196  frame.data[6] = m_CurrentTimeStamp;
197  m_CurrentTimeStamp=(uint8_t)((((uint32_t)m_CurrentTimeStamp)+1)&0xFF);
198  frame.data[7] = doutput;
199  m_Bus.WriteFrame(frame);
200  }
201 
203  void MotorModule::Command_ResetError()
204  {
205  struct can_frame frame;
206  frame.can_id = (canid_t)(m_ModuleId << 4);
207  frame.can_dlc = 2;
208  frame.data[0] = 0x01;
209  frame.data[1] = 0x06;
210  frame.data[2] = 0x00;
211  frame.data[3] = 0x00;
212  frame.data[4] = 0x00;
213  frame.data[5] = 0x00;
214  frame.data[6] = 0x00;
215  frame.data[7] = 0x00;
216  m_Bus.WriteFrame(frame);
217  }

220  void MotorModule::Command_DisableMotor()
221  {
222  struct can_frame frame;
223  frame.can_id = (canid_t)(m_ModuleId << 4);
224  frame.can_dlc = 2;
225  frame.data[0] = 0x01;
226  frame.data[1] = 0x0a;
227  frame.data[2] = 0x00;
228  frame.data[3] = 0x00;
229  frame.data[4] = 0x00;
230  frame.data[5] = 0x00;
231  frame.data[6] = 0x00;
232  frame.data[7] = 0x00;
233  m_Bus.WriteFrame(frame);
234  }

237  void MotorModule::Command_EnableMotor()
238  {
239  struct can_frame frame;
240  frame.can_id = (canid_t)(m_ModuleId << 4);
241  frame.can_dlc = 2;
242  frame.data[0] = 0x01;
243  frame.data[1] = 0x09;
244  frame.data[2] = 0x00;
245  frame.data[3] = 0x00;
246  frame.data[4] = 0x00;
247  frame.data[5] = 0x00;
248  frame.data[6] = 0x00;
249  frame.data[7] = 0x00;
250  m_Bus.WriteFrame(frame);
251  }

271  void MotorModule::Command_SetZeroPosition()
272  {
273  struct can_frame frame;
274  frame.can_id = (canid_t)(m_ModuleId << 4);
275  frame.can_dlc = 4;
276  frame.data[0] = 0x01;
277  frame.data[1] = 0x08;
278  frame.data[2] = 0x00;
279  frame.data[3] = 0x00;
280  frame.data[4] = 0x00;
281  frame.data[5] = 0x00;
282  frame.data[6] = 0x00;
283  frame.data[7] = 0x00;
284  m_Bus.WriteFrame(frame);
285  }

296  int32_t MotorModule::get_CurrentPosition(uint8_t& timeStamp, std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point& receptionTime, uint8_t& errorFlags, uint8_t& dinputs) const
297  {
298  const canid_t id = (canid_t)((m_ModuleId << 4) + 1);
299  bool bValid=false;
300  struct can_frame frame = m_Bus.get_LastFrame(id, receptionTime, bValid);
301  if(bValid)
302  {
303  timeStamp=(uint8_t)frame.data[5];
304  errorFlags=(uint8_t)frame.data[0];
305  dinputs=(uint8_t)frame.data[7];
306  return ((int32_t)((((uint32_t)frame.data[1]) << 24) | (((uint32_t)frame.data[2]) << 16) | (((uint32_t)frame.data[3]) << 8) | ((uint32_t)frame.data[4])))-m_MotorPositionOffset;
307  }
308  else
309  {
310  receptionTime=std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now();
311  errorFlags=0x00;
312  dinputs=0x00;
313  return 0;
314  }
315  }
316 
318  void MotorModule::Enable()
319  {
320  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Enabling motor.");
321  Command_ResetError();
322  uint8_t timeStamp;
323  uint8_t errorFlags;
324  std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point updateTime;
325  uint8_t dataBits;
326  int32_t real = get_CurrentPosition(timeStamp, updateTime, errorFlags, dataBits);
327  m_MotorPosition = real;
328  Command_EnableMotor();
329  std::this_thread::sleep_for (std::chrono::milliseconds(20));
330  Command_EnableMotor();
331  }
332 
334  void MotorModule::Disable()
335  {
336  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Disabling motor.");
337  Command_DisableMotor();
338  }
339 
341  void MotorModule::StartReferencing()
342  {
343  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Referencing started.");
344  Command_StartReferencing();
345  std::this_thread::sleep_for (std::chrono::milliseconds(20));
346  Command_StartReferencing();
347  }
348 
350  void MotorModule::SetZero()
351  {
352  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Setting to zero.");
353  Command_SetZeroPosition();
354  std::this_thread::sleep_for (std::chrono::milliseconds(20));
355  Command_SetZeroPosition();
356  uint8_t timeStamp;
357  uint8_t errorFlags;
358  std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point updateTime;
359  uint8_t dataBits;
360  m_MotorPosition = get_CurrentPosition(timeStamp, updateTime, errorFlags, dataBits);
361  }
